Comment: Abilities: A0OK (Corrupt Blood), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value:
Corrupt the target blood with the power of the Old Gods. The afflicted target cannot cast spells and will take damage per second. Upon its death, a Faceless One Deathbringer will spawn from its corpse. Corrupt Blood cannot be dispelled or cancelled.
Lasts 8 seconds on heroes and indefinitely on units.
 |n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - 40 damage per second and 2 Greater Doom Guards summoned.|n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - 70 damage per second and 4 Greater Doom Guards summoned. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - 100 damage per second and 6 Greater Doom Guards
